pages.text: Gelidus is the domain of cold, ice, and frost. Practitioners of this school can freeze their foes in place, summon blizzards, or encase their enemies in solid ice.
The mastery of Gelidus is not merely about freezing the world around themâ€”it is the embodiment of stillness, serenity, and the power of the frozen wilderness.
The cold heart of Gelidus is both an impenetrable defense and a method of controlling the flow of time itself. Its practitioners are often patient, with an unyielding calm in the face of danger.
